alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:35AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, northwestern Benton, southeastern Tipton, Fayette, northwestern Hardeman and eastern Shelby Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 235 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeland, or near Bartlett, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Collierville, Germantown, Millington, Cordova, Memphis, Lamar, Lakeland, Arlington, Whiteville, Somerville, Mt Pleasant, Ellendale, Eads, Slayden, Warren, Macon, Atoka, Oakland and Mason. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
